title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 October 2016 - XWiki
content:
<woshilapin> has quit  
01:34 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
03:18 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:20 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
07:08 <D-Spair> has quit  
07:11 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:14 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
08:15 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:18 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:46 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <woshilapin> has quit  
08:49 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <mflorea> has quit  
09:24 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:26 <ekarlso> has joined #xwiki  
09:26 <ekarlso> Hey guys, what is wrong when I get 2016-10-17 09:25:23,067 [http://wiki.creator.no/bin/loginsubmit/XWiki/XWikiLogin] WARN  c.x.x.XWiki                    - Failed to initialize AuthService com.xpn.xwiki.user.impl.LDAP.XWikiLDAPAuthServiceImpl using Reflection, trying defa  
09:26 <ekarlso> ult implementations using 'new'. ?  
09:26 <ekarlso> it's an upgrade and it looks like the class is missing or something ?  
09:27 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:29 <tmortagne> ekarlso: see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.3/#HLDAPModulemovedtoContrib  
09:29 <ekarlso> aha tmortagne, is there any support btw for openid connect or alike ?  
09:31 <tmortagne> ekarlso: yes extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/OpenID+Connect/, it was not tested much with other OpenId providers/clients yet and it does not implement 100% of the protocol but test and report would surely be nice :)  
09:31 <tmortagne> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/OpenID+Connect/  
09:32 <tmortagne> right now what was tested is mostly one XWiki instance as provider and another as client  
09:32 <tmortagne> (this is the need I had)  
09:49 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
09:50 <vmassol> welcome back mflorea. Hope you had some good holidays! :)  
09:50 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
09:52 <mflorea> vmassol: thanks, it was great, but now I need to catch up.. lots of mails  
09:52 <vmassol> yeah…  
10:09 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <Slashman> has quit  
10:46 <vmassol> FTR searching on l10n is really slow, making it almost unusable  
10:46 <vmassol> (searching for a translation that is)  
10:47 <vmassol> people must be swearing all the time when they contribute translations....  
11:00 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:06 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:36 <vmassol> evalica: good morning. Is it normal that we still have this translation and that it's not been deprecated: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/c9770c411961311b69bc77210996798866f079b1/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/resources/ApplicationResources.properties#L2033-L2033 ?  
11:36 <vmassol> I vaguely remember raising this some time ago  
11:37 <vmassol> but seems it's been forgotton  
11:37 <vmassol> \*forgotten  
11:37 <vmassol> right?  
11:39 <evalica> vmassol: recently I've deprecated xe.xwiki.space=XWiki , but I don't remember the status of xe.home.title=Home. I think we still need it, right? Since it's the name of the Main.WebHome.  
11:39 <vmassol> nope  
11:40 <vmassol> someone replaced the translation with a page  
11:40 <vmassol> so it's not used and the page title has not been translated in Fr (doing that part now but i'd like whoever did this to fix the transaltion key and deprecate it)  
11:42 <vmassol> tmortagne: quick question: how do I edit translations on http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Platform/ ? I don't see any button or links to do so. The only links there are going to the SCM.  
11:43 <vmassol> for ex I wanted to edit "Main.WebHome"  
11:43 <vmassol> (the LT at the bottom doesn't seem to work but that's another not related problem)  
11:43 <tmortagne> this list translations resources, you need to go in the resource page. See "View" link  
11:44 <vmassol> hmmm  
11:44 <vmassol> ok there's a bug  
11:44 <evalica> the FR page uses platform.dashboard.wiki.welcome  
11:44 <evalica> anyway the change was done in http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13478 by me and Alex  
11:44 <vmassol> my browser wasn't dusplaying any link!!  
11:44 <tmortagne> vmassol: are you logged in ?  
11:45 <vmassol> oh I see  
11:45 <vmassol> it's because the links are all hidden on the right  
11:45 <vmassol> outside of the view port :)  
11:45 <vmassol> (I got them by searching for "view")  
11:45 <tmortagne> I see them fine  
11:45 <vmassol> and my screen isn't really small...  
11:46 <tmortagne> Firefox put me the link on "URL" column on several lines  
11:46 <vmassol> preparing screenshot  
11:46 <vmassol> https://www.evernote.com/l/AHcj-fGaycNPc5QlaLxl9NiU7qEhWxUWNEE  
11:47 <vmassol> tmortagne: ok we have another problem  
11:47 <tmortagne> not sure about "my screen isn't really small", I see a lot more things than what's in your screenshot in my screen  
11:47 <vmassol> I'm not able to set the title using l10n  
11:47 <vmassol> only the content  
11:48 <vmassol> (for an xml page)  
11:48 <vmassol> i'm on http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Platform/MainWebHome?action=viewall&language=fr  
11:49 <tmortagne> it's possible only the content is display right now yes, I doubt we had the use case much in the past  
11:50 <vmassol> what's my solution right now?  
11:50 <vmassol> we have "Home" as the title of the page in French for ex  
11:51 <vmassol> regresion introduced by XWIKI-13478 (https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/fabfe568225f0c90c541b2378d1da9775d39166c)  
11:51 <tmortagne> I guess the only solution is to add support for the title  
11:52 <vmassol> evalica: do you understand the problem? ("the FR page uses platform.dashboard.wiki.welcome" is not correct)  
11:53 <evalica> yes - sorry - I was looking at some other branch.  
11:53 <vmassol> ok I'll create a jira to deprecate xe.home.title, unless you want to do it  
11:54 <evalica> would be great if you could do it  
11:54 <vmassol> k doing it  
11:54 <vmassol> tmortagne: would that be hard for you to do? ;)  
11:56 <Slashman> has quit  
11:57 <vmassol> BTW evalica you've lost all translations of the home page title we had + the fact that the home page waas translated in several languages  
11:57 <vmassol> right now it's only been re-translated in 2 languages  
11:57 <vmassol> (fr and ca)  
11:58 <vmassol> this is quite important for a home page IMO  
11:58 <vmassol> since this is the first thing users see  
11:58 <vmassol> so we need to organize this  
11:58 <vmassol> and get help from the community to do translations of the homre page  
11:59 <tmortagne> vmassol: done, need to reimport translations now  
11:59 <vmassol> wow fast  
11:59 <vmassol> you clicked reimport?  
11:59 <tmortagne> not yet  
11:59 <vmassol> should I do it? you di it?  
11:59 <vmassol> \*do  
11:59 <tmortagne> do we have the use case for more translations resources ?  
11:59 <tmortagne> import the whole thing takes ages  
11:59 <vmassol> not that I know of  
12:00 <vmassol> can't we just import this page?  
12:00 <tmortagne> we can, I was just asking if we needed to import all  
12:00 <vmassol> ok so lets just import this page  
12:00 <tmortagne> it's running  
12:00 <vmassol> thx  
12:01 <tmortagne> ready  
12:01 <vmassol> trying  
12:01 <vmassol> cool  
12:01 <tmortagne> check the export just to be sure we don't have a bad surprise during the release  
12:08 <vmassol> checking  
12:11 <vmassol> seems to work fine )  
12:11 <vmassol> :)

16:50 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.4RC1/, when I click on "add user change", I actually end up on a previous change  
16:51 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: checking  
16:51 <vmassol> I had fixed this, checking why it happens again  
16:51 <vmassol> in any case you increase the number for now manually int he URL  
16:51 <vmassol> (so that you're not blocked)  
16:53 <vmassol> btw we still have the Tree bug on xwiki.org  
16:53 <vmassol> (in the breadcrulmb)  
16:53 <vmassol> but it's not related normally  
17:02 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: btw we need to always fill the category field  
17:02 <vmassol> we don't use it right now (except for queries) but the goal is to use it more in the future  
17:03 <vmassol> in this case I'd say "Core" I think  (the change is in oldcore right?)  
17:05 <gdelhumeau> no  
17:05 <gdelhumeau> the change is in the administration app  
17:12 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: ok, hten "Administration Application" category  
17:12 <vmassol> (we alrready have one change in that category btw)  
17:12 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.3M2/Change001/

18:39 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:47 <barretto> guys, would one of you please explain me how to export a skin and "import" it in another xwiki instance? I've duplicated the flamingo folder, customized it and it works in one instance. If I move the folder to the other instance, and try to set the skin in XWiki/DefaultSkin the skin doesn't load. It still shows default flamingo. The target instance is a clean one (without the flavor extension). Did I miss something?  
18:47 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
18:48 <vmassol> has quit  
18:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
19:01 <dmd-xwiki> has joined #xwiki  
19:02 <dmd-xwiki> I can't get the distribution wizard to appear at startup  
19:02 <dmd-xwiki> even on a fresh VM  
19:02 <dmd-xwiki> that has never ever had xwiki or a database or anything on it before  
19:02 <dmd-xwiki> so there's definitely no pre-existing environment.permanentDirectory  
19:02 <dmd-xwiki> this is with xwiki-enterprise-web-8.3.war  
19:02 <dmd-xwiki> in jetty  
19:03 <vmassol> maybe we have a regression in 8.3?  
19:03 <dmd-xwiki> should i try an older version then  
19:03 <vmassol> it would be normal for the hsqldb/jetty packaging  
19:03 <vmassol> yes would be nice if you could try with 8.2.1 to confirm  
19:04 <dmd-xwiki> ok  
19:04 <vmassol> thanks  
19:05 <barretto> guys, would one of you please explain me how to export a skin and "import" it in another xwiki instance? I've duplicated the flamingo folder, customized it and it works in one instance. If I move the folder to the other instance, and try to set the skin in XWiki/DefaultSkin the skin doesn't load. It still shows default flamingo. The target instance is a clean one (without the flavor extension). Did I miss something?  
19:11 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
19:11 <vmassol> barretto: sounds ok  
19:12 <vmassol> maybe clear your browser cache  
19:12 <Enygma`> has quit
